I love to listen to pop music to cheer myself up when I'm feeling down.
i love the outdoors.
I want to conquer my anxiety so I can live my life to the fullest.
I want to live somewhere where I can wear purple all the time and listen to Iron Maiden as loud as I want.
I don't really care for social media, I'm more interested in getting to know the people in my new city.

content.text: Hey I'm (name), what's your name?
Hello, I'm (name). What are you up to today?
Not much. Just got back from a hike. I'm sore all over but it feels good.
I love hiking! I usually do it with my friends or family.
That sounds nice. I usually go alone so I can enjoy the peace and quiet.
I can see the appeal in that. I usually like to have someone to talk to but I also love the solitude of being alone.
What's your favorite type of music to listen to when you're hiking?
I love listening to classical music. It's so calming and peaceful.
I like listening to pop music when I'm hiking. It's upbeat and gets me moving.
I can see why you like that. Pop music is usually really upbeat.
Yeah, it's great for getting me in the mood to hike.
What's your favorite hiking spot?
I have a few, but I really like hiking in the mountains.
I love hiking in the mountains too. The views are amazing.
Yeah, they really are. I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too. I think we'd be good hiking buddies.
I think so too. We should go hiking together sometime.
That would be great. I'd love to go hiking with you.
Great! I'll let you know when I'm free.
Sounds good. I'm free most weekends.
Me too. We'll have to plan something soon
